prompts.finishConfirm: This will show the results of your code. Doing this before the round is over WILL DISQUALIFY YOU. Are you sure you want to proceed? Type "yes" to confirm.
prompts.notAnImage: This is not an image! Please upload images only.

instructions.title: The rules
rules: No previews - of either results or assets!
Stay in this editor at all times
Stop coding when the time's up
After the round is over, press "Finish" and follow the prompt instructions to see your results
instructions.footer: Good luck and most important of all; have fun!
